name: iPlayer Full Theater mode
description:
Fills browser window with the video player.
It ain't perfect but it works.
additional_info: It's a bit of a hack job because I suck at CSS but it'll work. One of the issues is the stuff below the video player; Title, description, more videos etc are a fixed distance down the page. This means if you have the browser window small there will be a big gap. If the height of your browser is >1080p it might be under the video. Also there's sometimes an advert before the main video, you can't press the skip button. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
